name: Eight Strange Corridors
summary: A looping space full of subtle anomalies. Can you spot them and find your way out?

name: Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes - The Chapter of Marisa
Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes - The Chapter of Markus
summary: In this story expansion, Markus, Carrie, and Nowa brace¬≠ themselves for an intriguing discove¬≠ry. An anomaly dubbed "Menhir's Distortion" has unlocked a myste¬≠rious teleportation gateway. Ve¬≠nturing forth as a trio, they prepare to de¬≠lve into the enigmatic re¬≠alm beyond. What hidden truths await the¬≠m there? Perhaps the¬≠ revelations would shed light on Markus's shroude¬≠d past, unearthing long-buried secre¬≠ts. With bated breath, they ste¬≠el themse¬≠lves for the unraveling of an extraordinary tale.

name: Eizo Play: Megumi
summary: Virtual View is a game in which you play the photographer's role once more, but this time the girls are displayed for you via 360 degree video. You can manipulate the camera all around the model(s) as they move, taking pictures from your desired angle. This was done by using multiple cameras, in a technique similar to the Matrix's bullet time - but of course the camera motion is completely controlled by you.

name: Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes - The Chapter of Seign
Eiyu*Senki - The World Conquest
summary:
Eiyuu Senki: The World Conquest is the English version of the original Eiyuu*Senki console port. It has some scenes removed like the original PS3/PSV port.

An improved version, Eiyuu*Senki GOLD or Eiyuu*Senki II, was later released in Japan. It has a new story and adds new characters, an item creation system, and an infinite dungeon.

"In Eiyuu Senki - The World Conquest, the player finds themselves in an alternate world populated with famous characters of history and legend - who also all happen to be beautiful maidens - and must fight their way to world domination."

name: Einn
summary: Separated from your raiding party you are a lone viking stranded in a strange new world. Use the environment to craft tools and weapons. Gather resources to build shelters. Hunt and be hunted by the local life. Will you let this new world claim you? Don't just survive. Thrive!

name: Eigengrau
summary: A twist at every turn! Explore a colorful shoot 'em up with varied and diverse gameplay beyond the familiar shooting and dodging. Every situation, every enemy, and every boss offers a different handcrafted experience.

name: Eight Dragons
summary: Can you and up to seven of your friends defeat the criminal gangs of the city and stop MR BIG? Prove your skills in EIGHT DRAGONS, an old-school scrolling beat-'em-up straight outta the eighties!

name: Eilean Mor: The Lost Keepers
summary: In 1900, off the coast of Scotland, the Eilean Mor lighthouse has gone silent. The light is out, and its three keepers are missing. No one is answering the radio. As a reserve keeper, you‚Äôre sent to investigate this horror mystery. But beware you may become the fourth to vanish.

name: Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes - Digital Deluxe Edition
summary: Eiyuden Chronicles: Hundred Heroes is designed to bring players a modern take on a classic JRPG experience. Get ready to lead 100+ playable characters through a war-torn world only you can save.

name: Eira
summary: "Eira" is a role-playing game developed by the independent team "Gearonin". In this game, you will play a girl named "Rui" who just turned 15 years old. Together with the thoughtful and handsome butler "Ralph", she runs and protects the ancient magic shop left by Rui's grandmother "Eira.

name: EightBound Regal
summary:
EightBound Regal is an ‚Äòremaster‚Äô of the original Final Fantasy / EarthBound crossover hack by Poliynm and Mareeta. Regal was created in response to complaints about the game being ‚Äòtoo difficult‚Äô.

EightBound was a hack that brought Final Fantasy characters, abilities, conventions, and challenges to the world of EarthBound.

name: Eighteen
summary:
You awaken in a house that is not yours. You are haunted by a past that you hope is not yours. You are given a name that you fear can never truly be yours.

You are Tohya Hachijo.

...Or are you?

In this short interactive experience, take control of an amnesiac looking to find his footing in the home of a strange woman, as he discovers his past -- or runs from it.

name: Eiga Sumikko Gurashi Sora no Oukoku to Futari no ko Asobou Chara Cross
summary: Use numbers as a hint to draw cute pixel art of the Sumikko characters!

name: Eigo wo Taberu Fushigi na Ikimono
summary: A pet sim like game where you're this girl that has to take care of this alien marshmallow cat thing and try to help it get back home

name: Eidolons Cross
summary: "Eidolons Cross" is a PvP strategy card game that combines poker and heroes. The game merges poker hand comparison mechanics with hero formations that trigger skills, creating entirely new strategies and gameplay. Players will recruit various heroes, build unique decks, and face off against opponents in poker battles to determine the victor.

name: Eight Dragons 2
summary: Eight Dragons 2 is a scrolling beat-'em-up where you, or you and up to 7 friends (local or online co-op), battle to liberate the city from gang rule.

name: Eighth Era
summary: The first game of its kind, rewarding competitive players with real-life collectibles. Embark on an epic journey 10,000 years in the future in Eighth Era! Join The Collector‚Äôs Society, battle digital monsters, and uncover powerful relics as you restore life to a world on the brink of collapse. With collectible coins and thrilling challenges, every victory brings you closer to a real-world reward. Dive into the adventure and experience a turn-based RPG like no other‚Äîwhere your virtual journey has real-world consequences!

name: Eight Ball Deluxe
summary: Eight Ball Deluxe is a digital pinball game, adapted from a physical pinball machine manufactured by Bally in 1981. The digital game was mad by Japanese developer LittleWing and released in 1993. The game is themed around cowboys playing billiards.

name: Eidolon
summary:
Eidolon is a game about exploring a mysterious landscape and uncovering the stories of the people who lived there once before. It is a game about history, curiosity, interconnectedness, and the slow and inevitable beauty of life.

You will be dropped into the dreary and mystical Western Washington circa 2400 c.e. with little to guide your way. Awaiting you is a vast landscape filled with wildlife, edible plants, and the memories of our now-dead culture‚Äîstored in artefacts such as journals, sketchbooks, newspapers, zines, brochures, transcripts, blogs, and more. Collect these memories and piece together what happened to these people.

name: Eien no Miyako
summary:
Hero is a college student who attends university in Tokyo. He lost father at young age and now lives with mother, father-in-law and sister-in-law Mariko.

A strange letter arrived from Mariko's pen friend Keiko who spends summer vacation on a "September Island (Ku Tsutou)".
"Strange events have been happening, please come quickly. I'm scared".
Hero used to visit this island together with his deceased father and together with Mariko they set off to help Keiko.
Keiko was supposed to work as maid in a western mansion, but only three mansion owner daughters are found there.

name: Eight Mini Racers
summary:
1 - 8 player local multiplayer 2D top-down racing game.

Racing, rockets, mines, steering failure, engine failure, repair kits, speed boosts and up to 8 players.

name: Eight Corners: A Maguntsche Story
summary:
An Insight Into The Past...

Taking place right before the events of Maguntsche: Chapter Two, you are a factory employee at the Pallen Organs Company who has awaken in a mysterious room with no memory of what happened before you were put here. The room has no windows or doors. Your goal is to find a way out. If there is one. But what is this? A hidden world is revealed with every blink. The air is cold and the space lacks light. Perhaps this darkness might shed some light on the unfortunate circumstances you have found yourself.

A Gift to Maguntsche Fans...

Releasing on the anniversary of Maguntsche: Chapter One, Eight Corners will give players the insight they need to be immersed in the growing universe when Chapter Two launches later this year.

How To Play...

Every 15 seconds, you will find yourself in one of two places. Our world or the realm. Our world acts as a "safe zone" where the player can charge their flashlight by accessing one of the terminals. If you enter the right sequence at the terminal, you gain +25% of your flashlights charge. When in the realm, there are two location you can be attacked from, using your flashlight you can flash an enemy using 25% of the charge to push them back away. There is a five second cool down for every time you use the flash ability. Your task is to survive as long as possible.

Increasing Difficulty...

The longer you survive, the more difficult the game becomes. The recharge sequences will gradually grow longer in length, and the enemies will approach more quickly.

name: Eiyu Senki Gold: A New Conquest
summary: Eiyu Senki Gold: A New Conquest is an improved version of Eiyuu Senki for PC and was only released in Japan. It uses the original characters in a new story and adds new characters, an item creation system, and an infinite dungeon.

name: Eiga Sumikko Gurashi: Aoi Tsukiyo no Mahou no Ko - Game de Asobou! Eiga no Sekai
summary:
Let's get excited with the 20 kinds of party mini-games base on movie episodes with family and friends!

This game is comical and strange base on movie episodes that contain 20 types of mini-games. All mini-games are compatible with a single Joy-Con and can play up to four players competitively or cooperatively.

Collect jigsaw puzzle pieces to complete the scene from the movie.

By playing the mini-games, you will receive puzzle pieces as a reward and can be placed into the jigsaw puzzle. When one jigsaw puzzle is complete, a scene from the movie will show.

Furthermore, you can repeat the completed jigsaw puzzle as many times as you like. The time it takes to complete is recorded, so you can break the record in the shortest time as you can.

New characters from the movie will appear.

Not only the familiar characters will appear, but also the new mages from the movie will appear in the game.

name: Eight Thirty, Nowhere
summary: Eight Thirty, Nowhere is an attempt at creating a massive, open space that is sparse, largely empty, with a focus on being a tone piece above all else.

name: Eien no Filena
summary: The game's story begins with Filena, a girl raised as a boy by her grandfather Zenna. Filena is raised as a boy because the Empire ruling the country forces girls into prostitution and turns boys into gladiators. After turning 16 Filena prepares to make her debut in the imperial coliseum, however before the battle she and her fellow gladiators are assigned concubines. Filena ignores her assigned bedmate, Lila, but Lila forces her way into Filena's room and learns the truth about her gender. Filena later fights through the gladiator ranks and discovers that their battles to the death are all scripted by behind-the-scenes writers. Filena then sets off with Lila on a quest to bring down an empire and reclaim her rightful place in a lost kingdom.

name: Einherjar's Ascent
summary: Battle through the Nine Realms in this Norse-themed survivor roguelite. Slay hordes, collect runes, upgrade abilities, and ascend as Odin‚Äôs chosen champion.

name: Eighth Day Kishimoto-kun
summary: Coming-of-age romance visual novel following a cynical high school student as he discovers the secret eighth day of the week.

name: Eien no Aselia: Kono Daichi no Hate de
summary: PS2 and PSP version of Eien no Aselia. Removes explicit content and the evil route but adds the content featured in the expansion as well as various improvements to the battle system.

name: Eisenhorn: Xenos
summary:
‚ÄòEisenhorn: Xenos' is a premium 3D action and adventure game based on ‚ÄòXenos', the first book in Games Workshop's best-selling ‚ÄòEisenhorn' trilogy, written by award winning author Dan Abnett. Set in the grim, dark future of Warhammer 40,000.

Eisenhorn: Xenos tells the story of Gregor Eisenhorn, an Inquisitor and member of the ‚ÄòOrdo Xenos', sent out to fight and protect the Imperium of man from anything that may threaten it. Presented in full 3D, Eisenhorn: Xenos players will get to play as Eisenhorn himself (voiced by Mark Strong), and explore various areas of the Warhammer 40k universe with a party of characters in tow.

name: Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes
summary: Eiyuden Chronicles: Hundred Heroes is designed to bring players a modern take on a classic JRPG experience. Get ready to lead 100+ playable characters through a war-torn world only you can save.

name: EightMan
summary: Murdered by criminals, Detective Yokoda's body is retrieved by Professor Tani and taken to his laboratory. There, Tani performs an experiment that has failed seven times; Yokoda is the latest subject to have his life force transferred into an android body. For the first time, the experiment succeeds. Yokoda is reborn as the armor-skinned android 8 Man, able to dash at impossible speeds, as well as shape-shift into other people. He shifts himself into Yokoda, this time christening himself as "Hachiro Azuma". He keeps this identity a secret, known only to Tani and his police boss Chief Tanaka. Even his girlfriend Sachiko and friend Ichiro do not know he is an android. As 8-Man, Hachiro fights crime (even bringing his murderers to justice). He smoked "energy" cigarettes, to rejuvenate his powers, that he carried in a cigarette case on his belt.

name: Eight-Minute Empire
summary: Eight-Minute Empire is the super-quick area control game requiring tough decisions. It‚Äôs easy to learn and perfect for when you only have a few minutes.

name: Ein's Sword
summary: Simple field battles and training. Defeat enemies that appear in the field and obtain ability points every time you level up. Raise your preferred status and advance the battle to an advantage. Easy to use and comfortable to play.

name: Einh√§nder
summary: Einh√§nder is a futuristic side-scrolling shooter featuring explosive visuals, pounding techno music, and simulated 3D gameplay.

name: Eisenwald: Blood of November
summary: Eisenwald: Blood of November is a new sandbox adventure in the world of Eisenwald. Take up your arms and fight for your cause (and find out first who or what you want to be fighting for).

name: Eigo de Tabi Suru: Little Charo
Eipc Free Tetris
summary: A free version of puzzle game Tetris, developed and published by EIPC.

name: Einherjar
summary: Einherjar is a combination RTS and turn-based game, with roguelike elements. Defend against waves of enemies as your territory expands, and the opposition becomes tougher, while building up your base and defending and upgrading your resources.

name: Eien
summary: A doujin game based on Tactics' "One ~Kagayaku Kisetsu e~", with Kawana Misaki as main character.

name: Eightrun
summary: Eightrun is an intense, minimalist game of fast reflexes, in which the player tries to dodge patterns of obstacles while moving down an endless, octagonal tunnel.

name: Eiketsu Taisen
summary: Eiketsu Taisen is a real-time strategy card-based arcade game developed by Sega.

name: Eight Stones
summary: Play as a small spider. Return the eight stones to their rightful place on the Monument.

name: Eight-Minute Empire: Archipelago of Azra Map
summary: The recently discovered Islands of Azra are full of rare animal species and new opportunity for factions looking to expand their influence on the seas. Change of the rules for this map: For a coin you can upgrade the basic troop movement to water movement.

name: EIsland Hop
summary: You are trapped in a bay surrounded by rocks. You must find and collect all the portal shards scattered across different islands to gain the chance to escape! Are you able to rebuild the portal in time, or will you stay trapped forever?

name: Eiga Sumikko Gurashi: Tobidasu Ehon to Himitsu no Ko - Game de Asobou! Ehon no Sekai
Eiga Sumikko Gurashi: Tsugihagi Koujou no Fushigi na Ko
Eight Forces
summary: Eight Forces is a weird game. Everything about it, the visuals, the music, the theme, it‚Äôs all quite bizarre, but fascinating. Not many people know its actually related to the Star Force series, more so as a kind of ‚Äògaiden‚Äô than a continuation of the story, though none of us will really know for sure considering the games story is incredibly mysterious and nothing is really known about it. Despite the English title displayed, the direct translation from the Japanese katakana of the game is ‚ÄòEight Force‚Äô.

name: Eidolon adventure
summary: This is a casual hang - up game, in the game you can defeat the eidolon to make your eidolons more powerful.

name: Eigo wo Taberu Fushigi na Ikimono Marsh
Einar: Loki's Traps
summary: Einar is a Viking who, finding himself a god, had a surprise.

name: Either
summary: Either is the largest online game of "would you rather" questions.

name: Eisei Meijin
summary: Eisei Meijin is a digital conversion of the traditional Japanese board game Shogi for one or two players, and the first game in Konami's long-running Shogi series to come to console. In addition to standard play against the computer or a second player, it includes the ability to record and play back matches, and even includes playable records of several historical Shogi matches from the Edo era. Also included are a board edit mode and a tool that automatically solves Tsume Shogi problems.

name: Eisen
summary: Eisen is a MechSimulator that allows you to pilot a massive Mech! You start by entering a heavy iron box and activating your mech. To destory the enemy Mechs, not only piloting skills but also mech upgrades are important strategic elements. It is up to you to decide which armament to upgrade and how. Destroy the oncoming enemies with a variety of armaments.

name: Einsteins Riddle
summary: A pure, simple game of logic and deduction. Random generated puzzles enables unlimited replay. Custom board layouts let you adjust the difficulty and time needed to solve a puzzle.

name: Eisei Meijin II
summary: Eisei Meijin II is a digital conversion of the traditional Japanese board game Shogi for one or two players, and the second game in the series to appear on consoles. It is very similar to the previous release, offering all of the same features: play against the computer or a second player, recording and playback of matches, playable records of historical matches, and a Tsume Shogi solver tool. New in this updated version of the game are: ‚Ä¢ An improved move prediction tool with faster performance ‚Ä¢ A new extra-easy "Level 0" difficulty option ‚Ä¢ Additional historical matches available for replay

name: Eikou no Saint Andrews
summary: Eik≈ç no Saint Andrews is a golf video game for the Nintendo 64 set in the Royal and Ancient Golf Club of St Andrews. It was released only in Japan in 1996 and was the first golf game for the Nintendo 64 console.

name: Eight.Domino.Heart
summary:
Eight.Domino.Heart is a logic puzzle game of dominoes üÅ¨ üÅ∂ üÅº
Use your wits to fit every domino together and fill the board!

name: Eins Ring
summary: A doujin game by ZWEi based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Eikan ha Kimi ni: Koukou Yakyuu Zenkoku Taikai
summary: Eikan ha Kimi ni: Koukou Yakyuu Zenkoku Taikai is a baseball video game developed and published by Artdink.

name: Eight Balls
summary: This is a ball platform jumping and leisure game. You can race against time in this game or play it casually. How you want to play depends on you.

name: Eidolon
summary: Save Kara & Rachael from the event of Abiodenis's mine.

name: Eight Legged Freaks
summary: A freeware first-person shooter based on the eponymous schlocky movie about giant mutant spiders that came on the DVD.

name: Eikan wa Kimi Ni 4
summary: Eikan wa Kimi Ni 4 is a baseball simulation game developed and published by Artdink.

name: Eikoh Seminar Koushiki DS Kyouzai: Shougakkou Eigo - Eitan Zamurai DS
Eikoh Seminar Koushiki DS Kyouzai: Koukou Eitango - Eitan Zamurai DS
Eiken Kakomondai Shuuroku: Eiken DS 2 Deluxe
summary: A language-learning edutainment game.

name: Eikoh Seminar Koushiki DS Kyouzai: Chuugaku Eitango - Eitan Zamurai DS
Eisenhorn: Xenos - Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Deluxe Edition of Eisenhorn: Xenos includes:

- A digital copy of Eisenhorn: XENOS the game
- Game Soundtrack
- Digital Artbook (Available September)
- Special Eisenhorn: XENOS prequel comic created by TPub (Available Late August)
- Digital copy of the novel 'Xenos' by Dan Abnett

name: Einar
summary: The player takes on the role of Einar, who is on a quest to kill the inhabitants of a Norse fishing village who are infected by a mysterious material. Use different weapons such as the bow, hammer and axe to clear the village of the monsters.

name: Eidolons: Nethergate
summary: A dark roguelike RPG with unique party and death mechanics, strategic open-world gameplay and intense story-driven ending. Offers innovative turn-based combat, large hand-drawn map and random dungeons to explore, deep hero customization, epic boss fights and advanced dialogue system!

name: Eien no Aselia Expansion: The Spirit of Eternity Sword
summary: A stand alone expansion for Aselia the Eternal, retelling the final chapter chapter with new story paths and endings.

name: Eighteen Gold
summary: Enlist in law enforcement or misfortune, take the intensity of combat to a new level and control of the situation in your hands, with the magnificent shooting simulator with 85% realism, Eighteen Gold...

name: Eight
summary: Eight is a short horror experience inspired by Layers of Fear in which you can discover the history of a classic mansion and its previous inhabitants. This product has been made within one month and serves as an experiment of our work methodology.

name: Eia
summary: A short story in which a boy saves a girl.

name: Eight Sweets
summary: A visual novel set in the 60s.

name: Ein Fall f√ºr TKKG: Katjas Geheimnis
Ein Fall f√ºr TKKG: Detektiv gesucht!
Eidolon
summary: Welcome to Eidolon University! Explore the grounds while interacting with eight NPCs (six romance-able) and learning the secrets of the university.

name: Eidols
summary: Eidols is a psychedelic survival game, set in an alien landscape. As you survive your creature will adapt to your actions, and as you die the life you lived will affect your future creatures. Features deep lore, a wide variety of different abilities, and multiplayer servers to explore it all on.

name: Eizoku
summary:
Eizoku is a short experimental horror game.

Eizoku is currently in beta. Due to personal matters and lack of ideas I am putting work on Eizoku on indefinite hiatus. I may or may not return to it to flesh it out but I hope that many people can still enjoy it in it's current form.

I've optimized the game as best as I can but unfortunately games that seem to have older or lower quality graphics cards have framerate issues.

Donations are greatly appreciated as I have been unemployed for close to a year and need to keep myself afloat to keep doing what I love.

name: Eight
summary: The world has been infected by deadly purple flowers. Eight lives are forever changed and they must come together to rid the world of this floral enemy.

name: Eira: Echoes of Adventure
summary: Eira: Echoes of Adventure is a casual adventure game where you play as Eira and trace your grandfather‚Äôs footsteps to journey through an icy world filled with curious alien wildlife, spatial puzzles, and hoards of treasure.

name: Eight Days
summary: First appearing as an unnamed tech demo at E3 2005, Eight Days was officially announced at the Sony E3 press conference before being canceled shortly after.

name: Eight Winds
summary: A fast paced, highly technical 3D fighting game with an incredibly high skill ceiling and a large amount of freedom for self-expression

name: Einstein's Cats
summary: Cats in boxes; alive or dead? Wait, no, no this isn‚Äôt Schroedinger. This is Einstein‚Äôs Cats! A cozy, relaxing logic puzzle game about cats and boxes; which cats go where? But be careful, you know how picky cats can be!

name: Eitr
summary: The Shield Maiden, as with all mortal Norsemen, was to have her fate determined by the three fate- weaving Norns and their sacred loom before she even entered the world. However, her destiny was shattered when the mischievous god Loki interfered, dripping spots of the wretched substance Eitr into the unwoven loom, forever altering the Shield Maiden‚Äôs path and engulfing the great tree Yggdrasil in darkness. Now the Shield Maiden must venture into the nine Norse worlds connected by Yggdrasil and unravel the mystery of her fate.

name: Eidetus
summary: Remember Your Power

name: Eisenbahn X
summary:
With Eisenbahn X you can build complex railway worlds on your PC or notebook and it is possible to control trains as a train driver. You can control the entire rail traffic with a sophisticated signal system. Build train consists from steam, diesel and electric locomotives, passenger and freight cars.
Please note that this software is in German only.
Search for Railroad X to find the english Edition.

name: Eisenbahn X: Modellset 1 - Bahnhof, H√§user, Scheunen
summary: MODELSET 1 for Railroad XThis MODELSET contains 63 individual models consisting of a railway station, houses, townhouses and barns.

name: Einherjar
summary: Summon and battle with heroes of legend and myth.

name: Eisenbahn X: Berliner S-Bahn
summary: The DB class 481/482 is an elektric railcar designed for conductor rail operation used by the S-Bahn Berlin. It's the latest design for the S-Bahn Berlin and currently the version that is used most.

name: Eight-Minute Empire: Mountains
summary: Scouts inform that new lands are full of mountains. Control most important valleys and hills gives you best position in the final battle. Build mountain city to increase your influence. Natives settlers and builders might help you, so collect goods and save money to pay them.

name: Eiyuu Densetsu: Sora no Kiseki - Kizuna
Einheriar
summary: "Einheriar" is a tower defense game that aims to prevent monster invasions. You must summon potential and talented warriors from the world to protect this land!

name: Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes - Hope of the Alliance: Special HQ Statue
summary: Add-on for Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes, containing 1x Special HQ Statue - (Nowa Haniwa) Please double-check all descriptions before purchasing.

name: Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes - Pioneer Pack
summary: Add-on for Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes, containing 1x Headquarters Custom Object (Honorable Flag) and 1x Early Bird Pack (1x Enhancement Rune & 1x Enhancement Accessory). Please double-check all descriptions before purchasing.

name: Eight Characters, a Number, and a Happy Ending
summary: A game written by K.G. Orphanides for the Annual Interactive Fiction Competition.

name: Eight Pool Fever
summary: Set in a dynamic city, in 8 Pool Fever, the players engage in seasonal challenges, progressing through clubs to challenge the city's boss. Giving you the very best of live billiards games and pool competitions, only the most skillful 8 b pool players will conquer all challenges.

name: Eith√©a
summary:
A PS1 RPG from TamTam, the developer of Khamrai and Eternal Eyes.

Featuring character designs by Aoi Nanase, the creator of manga Angel/Dust, Eith√©a tells the story of a group of high school students and their teacher who are spirited away to the mystical world of Eith√©a, and must search for a way home. The game incorporates significant dating sim influences, with protagonist Shou being able to romance one of the game's many female characters over its course.

name: Eigo Monogatari
summary:
Eigo Monogatari is a fun and interactive mobile game designed to help Japanese speakers learn English. Celebrate 10 years of engaging storytelling, diverse vocabulary, and exciting gameplay! Join us as we explore the world of Eigo Monogatari and discover how to make English learning an adventure.
Interactive storytelling: Make choices, interact with characters, and shape your own adventure.
Diverse vocabulary: Learn natural English expressions through various situations and conversations.

name: Eidolon Awakened
summary: Eidolon Awakened is a turn-based creature collector RPG set in a post-apocalyptic world overtaken by creatures known as Eidolons. Take your place among the Summoners, able to capture and control the Eidolon to determine the fate of mankind.

name: EigenGauge
summary: EigenGauge is a high speed retro racing game.

name: Eisei Meijin III: Game Creator Yoshimura Nobuhiro no Zunou
summary: Eisei Meijin III - Game Creator Yoshimura Nobuhiro no Zunou is a traditional video game released in 1999 by Konami for the Playstation & Dreamcast consoles. The game was only released in Japan. The game is based on the traditional board game shogi.

name: Eigenstate
summary: Deep inside a hyper quantum computer a holy booting process has started ... #GlobalGameJam

name: Eikoku Tantei Mysteria
summary: Eikoku Tantei Mysteria is a 2013 otome visual novel video game for the PlayStation Portable created by Karin Entertainment and published by Marvelous in Japan.

name: Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes - Season Pass
summary: Eiyuden Chronicles: Hundred Heroes is designed to bring players a modern take on a classic JRPG experience. Get ready to lead 100+ playable characters through a war-torn world only you can save.

name: Eigen Space
summary: Escape the Eigen Space in this fast paced auto runner, shooter looter, rouge lite game with a story to make you doubt what is reality.

name: Einlanzer
summary: Einlanzer is a full-scale, epic fantasy role-playing game. The story of Einlanzer was written by a professional fantasy novelist, and has 28 original music tracks. Einlanzer has a highly strategic battle system, massive scope, and difficult moral decisions that permanently affect the storyline.

name: Eight-Minute Empire: Complete Edition
summary: Eight-Minute Empire is a quick Civilization/Exploration game using card-driven area control. 2-5 players take turns selecting a card from the six displayed. This card gives the player a resource, and also has an action which the player takes immediately. Actions help players take over the map, but the resources are worth points at the end of the game, so players have to balance the two aspects. Players spread across the map in order to collect points at the end of the game by having majority control in regions and continents.

name: Eiyuden Chronicle: Rising
summary: Eiyuden Chronicle: Rising is an action RPG set in the same world as Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes. Featuring town-building mechanics, fast-paced combat, and important back-story for several of the Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes cast of characters.
